skills.name: assess-status
skills.description: Assess project or task status and health

skills.name: evaluate-priority
skills.description: Evaluate and prioritize tasks based on impact and urgency
skills.inputs: Task list or backlog|Business context|Resource constraints

skills.name: inspect-codebase
skills.description: Analyze codebase structure and architecture
skills.when_to_use: Starting work on unfamiliar codebase;Before making significant changes;Understanding project architecture;
skills.inputs: Repository root path|Specific area of interest (optional)
skills.outputs: Codebase structure overview|Key components identification|Technology stack summary

skills.name: inspect-logs
skills.description: Analyze logs to identify issues and root causes
skills.when_to_use: Debugging production issues;Investigating test failures;Understanding application behavior;
skills.inputs: Log files or log output|Error description (optional)|Time range (optional)
skills.outputs: Root cause identification|Error pattern analysis|Recommended fixes

skills.name: parse-requirement
skills.description: Parse and clarify requirements before coding
skills.when_to_use: User request is vague;Need clear specs;Multiple approaches possible;

skills.name: fix-defect
skills.description: Fix bugs and defects in code
skills.when_to_use: Bug reported by users/QA;Test failure;Error in logs;
skills.inputs: Bug report or error description|Steps to reproduce

skills.name: manage-issues
skills.description: Create, update, and manage issues in tracking systems
skills.when_to_use: Creating bug reports;Creating feature requests;Updating issue status;

skills.name: refactor-code
skills.description: Refactor existing code without changing behavior
skills.when_to_use: Code smells identified;Technical debt reduction;Before adding new features;

skills.name: update-documentation
skills.description: Update documentation to match code changes
skills.when_to_use: After adding new features;After changing APIs;After fixing bugs (if user-facing);

skills.name: write-code
skills.description: Write code using test-driven development

skills.name: commit-changes
skills.description: Write commit message and commit changes

skills.name: create-merge-request
skills.description: Create merge request for completed work
skills.when_to_use: All tasks done;All commits done;Ready to merge;

skills.name: merge-changes
skills.description: Merge approved changes into target branch

skills.name: notify-stakeholders
skills.description: Notify relevant stakeholders about changes

skills.name: publish-report
skills.description: Publish project reports and metrics

skills.name: allocate-resources
skills.description: Allocate team resources to tasks and projects
skills.inputs: Task list with estimates|Team member availability|Skill requirements

skills.name: breakdown-work
skills.description: Break down large tasks into manageable subtasks
skills.when_to_use: Large feature implementation;Epic to task decomposition;Sprint planning;

skills.name: design-solution
skills.description: Design solution and plan implementation

skills.name: design-test-plan
skills.description: Design comprehensive test plan for implementation
skills.when_to_use: After design-solution complete;Before implementation starts;Complex features requiring multiple test levels;

skills.name: estimate-effort
skills.description: Estimate effort for tasks and features

skills.name: schedule-timeline
skills.description: Create project timeline and schedule

skills.name: analyze-impact
skills.description: Analyze impact of proposed changes

skills.name: check-intent
skills.description: Lightweight intent alignment check during development
skills.when_to_use: During `agent dev check` (automated);After making changes, before commit;When unsure if changes align with plan;
skills.outputs: Alignment status (pass/warn)|List of unplanned changes (if any)

skills.name: check-style
skills.description: Check code style and lint

skills.name: review-code
skills.description: Review code quality

skills.name: run-tests
skills.description: Run tests and check coverage

skills.name: verify-requirements
skills.description: Verify implementation matches original intent
skills.when_to_use: After implementation complete;Before commit/PR;When unsure if requirements are met;
